category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 10 (Safety and Health Management Supervisor)
contents: Article 10 (Safety and Health Management Supervisor) ① A safety and health management supervisor (hereinafter referred to as *Management Supervisor) is a person who manages and supervises the Corporation's disaster and safety and health management work and is as follows. Revised 2021. 6. 14., 2021. 12. 22., 1. Headquarters: Head of each department, facility manager, 2. Regional headquarters (branch): Head of department, facility manager, ② Management supervisor of the regional headquarters (branch) Performs the duties stipulated in each subparagraph of Article 15 (1) of the Enforcement Decree of the Industrial Safety Act.
